Public NotInheritable Class MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement Inherits MessageEncodingBindingElement Implements IPolicyExportExtension, IWsdlExportExtension
type MtomMessageEncodingBindingElement = class inherit MessageEncodingBindingElement interface IWsdlExportExtension interface IPolicyExportExtension

summary.span: 指定消息传输优化机制 (MTOM) 消息所使用的编码和版本管理的绑定元素。

span.span: The binding element that specifies the encoding and versioning used for Message Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM) messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编码是将消息转换为一个字节序列的过程。Encoding is the process of transforming a message into a sequence of bytes. 解码是反向过程。Decoding is the reverse process. Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 包含三种类型的 SOAP 消息编码：文本、二进制和消息传输优化机制 (MTOM)。Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) includes three types of encoding for SOAP messages: Text, Binary and Message Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM). 表示指定使用消息传输优化机制 (MTOM) 编码的消息所用的字符编码和消息版本管理以及其他设置的绑定元素。The represents the binding element that specifies the character encoding and message versioning and other settings used for messages using a Message Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM) encoding. MTOM 是一种用于在 WCF 消息中传输二进制数据的有效技术。MTOM is an efficient technology for transmitting binary data in WCF messages. MTOM 编码器会尝试在效率和互操作性之间建立平衡。The MTOM encoder attempts to create a balance between efficiency and interoperability. MTOM 编码以文本形式传输大多数 XML，但通过按原样传输来优化大型二进制数据块的传输，无需将其转换为 base64 编码格式。The MTOM encoding transmits most XML in textual form, but optimizes large blocks of binary data by transmitting them as-is, without conversion to their base64 encoded format. 有关指定使用 XML 文本表示形式对消息进行编码的绑定元素的详细信息，请参阅 。For more information about the binding element that specifies that messages are encoded using a textual representation of XML, see . 有关指定消息的绑定元素的详细信息，请参阅 XML 的 .NET 二进制格式，请参阅 。For more information about the binding element that specifies messages are encoded using the .NET Binary Format for XML, see . 若要实现自定义消息编码器，请使用 类。To implement a custom message encoder, use the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement Clone() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Clone () As BindingElement

summary.span: 创建一个从当前对象初始化的新 对象。

span.span: Creates a new object initialized from the current one.

returns.span: 一个 对象，其属性值等于当前元素的属性值。

span.span: A object with property values equal to those of the current element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这将创建当前绑定元素对象树的完整副本，也称为深层克隆。This creates a complete copy of the current binding element object tree, also called a deep clone. 对象的深层克隆创建对象的副本以及该对象直接或间接引用的所有内容的副本。A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. (这称为复制整个对象图。 ) 返回深层克隆使运行时能够支持多个自定义绑定共享自定义绑定元素的情况。(This is called copying the entire object graph.) Returning a deep clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element. 如果未返回深层克隆，则运行时行为将不可确定。If a deep clone is not returned, the run-time behavior is undefined. 相比之下，对象的浅表克隆只是对象本身的副本。A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only. 如果对象包含对其他对象的引用，则浅表复制不创建所引用对象的副本，而是仅复制对原始对象的引用。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.

Public Overrides Function GetProperty(Of T As Class) (context As BindingContext) As T

span.span: The typed object for which the method is querying.
The for the binding element.

summary.span: 从绑定元素堆栈的适当层返回所请求的类型化对象（如果存在）。

span.span: Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the binding element stack.

returns.span: 如果存在，则为所请求的类型化对象 ，如果不存在，则为 。

span.span: The typed object requested if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可请求从绑定元素堆栈的适当层返回一个用于设置属性或获取状态的类型化对象。Use this to request a typed object for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the binding element stack. 如果某个层支持返回所请求的对象，则该层会返回对象。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不支持，则该层仅仅将调用委托给堆栈中的下一层。If not, it simply delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到达堆栈底部仍然没有绑定元素层支持所请求的对象，则该方法返回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no binding element layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxBufferSize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxBufferSize : int with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置缓冲区的最大大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum buffer size.
The maximum size of the buffer.
The default value is 65536 (0x10000) bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息传输优化机制在 Windows Communication Foundation 中 (MTOM) 消息 (WCF) 可包含多个 MIME 部分。Message Transmission Optimization Mechanism (MTOM) messages in Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) can consist of multiple MIME parts. 该消息一直包含含有其信息集部分的 MIME（Multipurpose Internet Mail Extension，多用途 Internet 邮件扩展）部分。The message always includes a Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) part that contains the infoset portion of the message. 另外，如果该消息包含经优化的二进制数据，则它还有可能包含其他含有二进制数据的 MIME 部分。In addition, if the message contains binary data that is optimized, it may contain additional MIME parts that contain binary data. 至于这些 MIME 部分应该以何种顺序出现在该消息中，并没有强制性的要求。There are no requirements imposed about what order these MIME parts must appear in the message. 有时候，如果 MIME 部分顺序紊乱，消息读取过程就必须对其进行缓冲。The message reading process sometimes must buffer MIME parts if they appear out of order. 消息读取过程还有可能必须对每一部分的相关 MIME 标头信息进行缓冲。The message reading process also may have to buffer relevant MIME header information in each part. 该 配额旨在为读取 MTOM 消息时所分配的内存量制定一个上限，这样缓冲需求就限制了过多的内存消耗。This quota is intended to cap the amount of memory that can be allocated when reading MTOM messages and so limit the excessive consumption of memory due to the buffering requirements.

exception.span: 设置的值小于或等于零。

span.span: The value set is less than or equal to zero.

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置分配给池且可随时用于处理传入消息的 XML 读取器的最大数量。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of XML readers that is allocated to a pool and is ready for use to process incoming messages.

value.span: 要保留在池中的读取器的最大数量。

span.span: The maximum number of readers to be kept in the pool.

value.span: 默认值为 64 个读取器。

span.span: The default value is 64 readers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增大此数字将会增加内存消耗，但能够让编码器处理传入消息的突现高峰，因为编码器可以使用池中已创建的读取器，而不必创建新的读取器。Increasing this number increases memory consumption, but prepares the encoder to deal with sudden bursts of incoming messages because it is able to use readers from the pool that are already created instead of creating new ones.

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

summary.span: 获取或设置分配给池且可随时用于处理传出消息的 XML 读取器的最大数量。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of XML writers that is allocated to a pool and are ready for use to process outgoing messages.

value.span: 要保留在池中的编写器的最大数量。

span.span: The maximum number of writers to be kept in the pool.

value.span: 默认值为 16 个编写器。

span.span: The default value is 16 writers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 增大此数字将会增加内存消耗，但能够让编码器处理传出消息的突现高峰，因为编码器可以使用池中已创建的编写器，而不必创建新的编写器。Increasing this number increases memory consumption, but prepares the encoder to deal with sudden bursts of outgoing messages because it is able to use writers from the pool that are already created instead of creating new ones.

span.span: The value is less than or equal to zero.

summary.span: 获取或设置可由配置了此绑定元素的终结点处理的 XML 消息的复杂性约束。

span.span: Gets or sets constraints on the complexity of XML messages that can be processed by endpoints configured with this binding element.

value.span: 为交换的 SOAP 消息指定复杂性约束的 。

span.span: The that specifies the complexity constraints on SOAP messages exchanged.

value.span: 下面的备注部分中提供了这些约束的默认值。

span.span: The default values for these constraints are provided in the following Remarks section.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这些复杂性约束可以抵御某种类型的拒绝服务 (DOS) 攻击，这些攻击试图利用消息复杂性来占用终结点处理资源。The complexity constraints protect against a class of denial of service (DOS) attacks that attempt to use message complexity to tie up endpoint processing resources. 表达这些约束及其默认值的属性如下所示：The properties that express these constraints and their default values are as follows: - = 32 = 32 - = 8192 = 8192 - = 16384 = 16384 - = 4096 = 4096 - = 16384 = 16384 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

summary.span: 策略断言生成之后会插入到 WSDL 中，指示 MTOM 编码正在使用中。

span.span: Inserts a policy assertion into the WSDL, when it is generated, which indicates that an MTOM encoding is being used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此策略断言指示，MTOM 优化可用于这一终结点中。This policy assertion indicates that MTOM optimization can be used at this endpoint. 这表明必须接受文本或 MTOM 格式的消息。It implies that messages either in the text or MTOM format must be accepted. 此策略断言在客户端已经过分析，并且接受 MTOM 编码消息的功能已启用。On the client, this policy assertion is parsed and the ability to accept MTOM-encoded messages is enabled. 策略断言如下所示。The policy assertion is as follows. ``` ```

span.span: is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认文本编码为 UTF-8 格式。The default text encoding is the UTF-8 format. 其他可能的编码包括 Unicode 和 Big Endian Unicode 等。Other possible encodings include, for example, Unicode and Big Endian Unicode.
